Policy Manager Scripting API

Packages
com.soa.alert.reporter.script This package includes a scripting API for generating alerts.
com.soa.audit.script This package includes a scripting API for recording messages with the audit messages generated as part of an auditing policy.
com.soa.message.handler.script This package includes a scripting API for message (policy) handlers.
com.soa.message.script This package includes a scripting API for messages and message exchanges.
com.soa.process.bpel.runtime.script This package includes all objects available in the process related scripts.
com.soa.security.script This package includes a scripting API for identity information both authenticated and unauthenticated.
com.soa.security.script.saml1 This package includes a scripting API for SAMLv1 public credentials.
com.soa.security.script.saml2 This package includes a scripting API for SAMLv2 public credentials.
